title: wine_Steininger_2013_Cabernet_Sauvignon_Rosé_Sparkling_(Österreichischer_Sekt)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 128785.
country: Austria.
description: The palest pink fizz exudes notes of tart blackcurrant and aromatic blackcurrant leaf in this rare Cabernet Sauvignon-based sparkling. The palate is light, dry, softly fizzing and ticks all the boxes of an elegant, refreshing traditional-method sparkling wine. The blackcurrant notions are softer on the palate but they echo with every tiny bubble that bursts. This has enough structure to go from apéritif through to food, in fact, creative cooks may find this will chime with their subtle creations..
designation: Cabernet Sauvignon Rosé.
points: 91.
price: 29.0.
province: Österreichischer Sekt.

taster_name: Anne Krebiehl MW.
